name: Aditya Singh
position: Early stage VC  at Capital-A | Fintech | Deeptech |
about: An investment professional, CFA  Level 2 candidate & graduate in International Finance. The primal objective of my professional endeavors is to delve deeper into depths of alternate investments & financial markets. Presently scaling the roots of the startup ecosystem at Capital-A: with our thesis in Fintech, Climatech and Cleantech. Capital-A is  a purpose driven fund who aspire to be catalytic by making meaningful investments with seminal impact for all stakeholders.
